body_html:
@peterjc123 I am having some issue with deploying a new Windows image for AWS (the new machines don't connect to Jenkins). Is there a way to download the clang toolchain in the build script in order to test this PR? I have the following to download and install LLVM:

curl.exe -k -O https://s3.amazonaws.com/ossci-windows/LLVM-6.0.0.7z
7z x ./LLVM-6.0.0.7z -o"C:\Program Files\LLVM"
cmd.exe /c "C:\Program Files\LLVM\tools\msbuild\install.bat"

In the mean time I will figure out how to make the new images work with Jenkins.

body:
@peterjc123 I am having some issue with deploying a new Windows image for AWS (the new machines don't connect to Jenkins). Is there a way to download the `clang` toolchain in the build script in order to test this PR? I have the following to download and install LLVM:
```
curl.exe -k -O https://s3.amazonaws.com/ossci-windows/LLVM-6.0.0.7z
7z x ./LLVM-6.0.0.7z -o"C:\Program Files\LLVM"
cmd.exe /c "C:\Program Files\LLVM\tools\msbuild\install.bat"
```
In the mean time I will figure out how to make the new images work with Jenkins.
